item.title: Modeling Drug Use in Communities
item.description: Preface Introduction Aim Method Initial Model: SIR SUAR Model SAUR Model with age Simplified SUAR Model with age Results Discussion Conclusion References Appendix Appendix 1 : Stationary points of SIR model Appendix 2 : Stationary points of SUAR Appendix 3: Critical Points of Simplified SUAR model Appendix 4: Matlab code for generating conditional Stationary Points Appendix 5: Python code for simulating SIR model Appendix 6: Python code for simulating SUAR model Appendix 7: Python code for simulating 20 compartment SUAR model Appendix 8: Python code for simulating 5 compartment SUAR model Appendix 9: Python code for simulating 5 compartment dimensionless SUAR model Preface This was written as a University project but Iâ€™m pretty happy with how it turned out.
